Title: Imposes a moratorium on high-volume hydraulic fracturing and horizontal drilling for natural gas until every aquifer in the state is mapped and classified
Summary: Imposes a moratorium on high-volume hydraulic fracturing and horizontal drilling for natural gas until every aquifer in the state is mapped and classified by the United States Geological Survey and/or the New York State Geological Survey, and the department of environmental conservation has adopted regulations to protect such aquifers.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a moratorium on high-volume hydraulic fracturing and horizontal drilling for natural gas until all aquifers are classified and mapped
